metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Shares the quirky, fast-paced humor of 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny,' with a dysfunctional family at its core.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Similar to 'Scrubs,' features an ensemble cast in a unique setting with a blend of heart and absurd humor.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Combines comedy with a police procedural setting, mirroring the elements found in some of the crime dramas you enjoy but with a lighthearted approach.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Offers the same optimistic and heartwarming humor as 'Ted Lasso' with a strong ensemble cast.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Blends comedy with philosophical themes, similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'Futurama,' exploring complex ideas in an accessible way.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A hilarious mockumentary-style comedy with dark humor and supernatural elements, fitting with your appreciation for unconventional comedies.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky, sci-fi mystery that's as unpredictable and inventive as 'Rick and Morty' and has elements of the crime dramas you watched.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi dramedy with strong performances and surreal visuals, appealing to your appreciation for 'Love, Death & Robots' and thought-provoking narratives.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A complex and suspenseful mystery with sci-fi elements, similar to 'Stranger Things' and your crime shows but with a darker, more intricate storyline.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: An anthology series that explores dark and thought-provoking themes related to technology, fitting with your interest in Sci-Fi and darker shows.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A suspenseful sci-fi thriller with a compelling mystery and thought-provoking themes about work and identity, matching your interest in the genre and suspenseful plots.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A critically acclaimed sci-fi series with complex characters, political intrigue, and stunning visuals, appealing to your enjoyment of 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Battlestar Galactica (2004)
metas.description: A gripping sci-fi series with strong character development and intense action, suitable if you liked 'Fallout', 'Foundation' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: A spy thriller with a sci-fi twist involving parallel universes, which you might enjoy given your appreciation for mystery, sci-fi, and drama.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on the classic detective, full of mystery and suspense, similar to 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: A dark and gritty crime drama with a brilliant but troubled detective, appealing to your enjoyment of crime and mystery shows.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: A gripping police procedural with complex characters and intricate plots, matching your enjoyment of crime dramas.

metas.name: Happy Valley
metas.description: A compelling crime drama with strong character development and a realistic portrayal of law enforcement, aligning with your interest in serious crime TV shows.

metas.name: The Wire
metas.description: A realistic and complex crime drama set in Baltimore, offering a deep dive into the criminal justice system, which is great if you enjoyed 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: A stylish and suspenseful spy thriller with a cat-and-mouse dynamic between a detective and an assassin, that has elements of drama and crime you will likely appreciate.

metas.name: Banshee
metas.description: An action-packed crime drama with a complex anti-hero and intense fight sequences, that could appeal to your taste in mystery and darker themes.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: A comedy-drama that blends humor with social commentary, similar to 'Brassic' and 'Ted Lasso,' offering a unique perspective on life.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: A British sitcom with quirky characters and absurd situations, in line with your appreciation for British humor and comedies like 'Goodness Gracious Me'.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: A cult classic British sitcom with geeky humor and fast-paced editing, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Derry Girls
metas.description: A hilarious comedy set in Northern Ireland during the Troubles, offering a unique perspective and relatable characters that are similar to Brassic and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: A British sitcom with a unique point-of-view and cringe-worthy humor, fitting with your enjoyment of British comedy and unconventional sitcoms.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: An animated superhero series with mature themes and brutal action, similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with a more serious tone.

metas.name: Castlevania
metas.description: A dark and violent animated series based on the video game, appealing to your interest in animation and action-adventure shows.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: A visually stunning animated series with a compelling story and well-developed characters, matching your appreciation for animation and fantasy.

metas.name: Attack on Titan
metas.description: A thrilling and dark animated action series with a complex plot and intense battles, like 'One-Punch Man' but with more serious themes.

metas.name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
metas.description: An animated series set in the Cyberpunk universe, similar to 'Fallout', with great animation and themes that are sci-fi.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A superhero series that subverts the genre with dark humor and violence, appealing to your interest in action and dark themes.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A sci-fi comedy series about the afterlife in a digital world, matching your appreciation for Sci-Fi and Comedy.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: A sci-fi comedy about an alien who crash lands on Earth and assumes the identity of a small-town doctor, which has aspects of Scrubs and Rick & Morty.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A science fiction comedy series that combines a mystery with a lot of humour that may appeal if you enjoyed Love Death & Robots.

metas.name: Extraordinary
metas.description: A hilarious sitcom about a young woman in a world where everyone gets superpowers at 18, except her. The humour is similar to Ted Lasso and It's Always Sunny.

metas.name: Doom Patrol
metas.description: A superhero series with dark humor and unique characters, this might align with your taste in dark humour that is seen in It's Always Sunny and One-Punch Man.

metas.name: Warehouse 13
metas.description: A sci-fi series combining humour with a compelling storyline, which will likely suit fans of Fallout and Doctor Who.

metas.name: Lost in Space
metas.description: This Netflix series shares many similarities with Fallout and features a great storyline and action.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: A sci-fi action series featuring agents from the future working to prevent the collapse of society. This may appeal if you liked Doctor Who and Fallout.
